data.name: Late Night 1320
data.detailed_description:
Experience a blast to the past of old school drag racing in its purest form. Find a variety of classic cars, trucks, and odd vehicles from the junkyard and rescue them from their inevitable demise. Once you've restored and fixed your junker, take it to the backroads and compete against a variety of racers to earn their respect. Work your way up the chain and gain rep with the local crowd. Discover new drag spots to further work your way up the chain and continue upgrading your car. Compete at the drag strip for the ultimate test against sponsored racers and become the Late Night king.

Read below for a FULL in depth view at Late Night 1320.

Backstory
  • You're fresh out of prison. You got busted for street racing a while back, but thing's have changed and your name has been forgotten. You need to work your way through the chain of racers out their putting their money and car's on the line. You need to show them who's back in town and ready to mix things up. You need a car. Where's the first place you go?

The Junkyard
  • At the junkyard you can find a plethora of junk cars to choose from. Some missing motors, others missing entire panels and suspension parts. Cars are sent here to die and you just happen to be one of the people that can save them. Taxis, Police Cars, Stunt Vehicles, Fire Response, and old daily junkers have all been left to rot. Old and used car parts also show up at the junkyard, and they are plentiful. You might even hit the jackpot and find barely used parts, but there is always a risk. Who knows what you'll find at the junkyard?

Street Racers
  • All street racers have something to prove, and are willing to throw just about anything down on the line if your rep matches your trash talk. Every racer has a rep of their own and they are trying to protect it, but they won't waste their time on someone who doesn't have any rep in the local scene. You need to start at the bottom and work your way up the list. You can put money, cars, or even garages on the line if you're desparate enough. You can race the local crowd or work your way up The Chain.

Drag Strip
  • The Drag Strip is always holding events that range from sub 12 second races, to 8 second drag monsters, all the way to anything goes races. Keep your eye on the entry dates, entry prices, and entry restrictions. You don't want to spend all day working on your car just to miss an event, but you also don't want to enter an event you aren't equipped for.

The Chain
  • The chain is a mysterior group of street racers who bet high, risk high, and win high. Find them and win amazing riches! But be careful. There is a reason they are well known.

data.short_description: Rescue a classic from the junkyard and bring it back to life. Then take it to the country backroads and work your way up the list of racers to earn your rep, discover new drag spots, take pinkslips, and compete on the drag strip. Become the Late Night king.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 4
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 4092 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DX11

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
